Pre-Game Insights: Experts predict Australia to eclipse England given their recent form and England's opening game getting washed out.
Australia enter the T20 World Cup 2024 with the goal of making history as the first country to hold the title in all three formats of cricket.
England will need to refind their attacking Bazball style to have a chance of successfully defending their title.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the Kensington Oval provides equal opportunities for batters and bowlers.
The average first innings score here is 137.
There is a looming rain threat with a 40 percent chance of showers.
Others: David Warner will open the innings for Australia and is in good form.
Phil Salt will open the innings for England and his explosive batting can help England get a quick start.
Glenn Maxwell and Chris Jordan might not be as effective and can be avoided for this game.
